document.full_text: prime minister naoto kan said on wednesday japan must rethink how nuclear power is regulated and explore other energy sources after a crisis at a tsunami-crippled plant, but sidestepped the question of how big a role atomic energy would play in the country's future.
document.title: japan pm: must review oversight of nuclear power
